---> # Mini-univerzum: planéta "Aurelia"# -------------------------------
> # 1.1 Atomic Types --------------------------------------------------------
> 
> # Numeric (double)
> avg_temperature <- 18.7        # priemerná teplota (°C)
> surface_area_million_km2 <- 1.45  # povrch v miliónoch km^2
> avg_elevation_m <- 820.3      # priemerné nadmorské výška (m)
> tourism_rating <- 4.3         # hodnotenie turista (1-5)
> 
> # Integer
> num_moons <- as.integer(2)    # počet mesiacov
> num_cities <- as.integer(7)   # počet väčších miest
> population_thousands <- as.integer(2435) # populácia v tisícoch
> 
> # Logical
> has_water <- TRUE
> is_inhabited <- TRUE
> 
> # Character
> planet_name <- "Aurelia"
> region <- "Cerulean Archipelago"
> category <- "Temperate"
> 
> # Jednoduché popisy (print / cat)
> cat("Planéta", planet_name, "sa nachádza v regióne", region, "a je kategórie", category, ".\n")
Planéta Aurelia sa nachádza v regióne Cerulean Archipelago a je kategórie Temperate .
> cat("Má", num_moons, "mesiace,", num_cities, "mestá a približne", population_thousands, "tisíc obyvateľov.\n")
Má 2 mesiace, 7 mestá a približne 2435 tisíc obyvateľov.
> cat("Priemerná teplota je", avg_temperature, "°C a turistické hodnotenie je", tourism_rating, "/5.\n")
Priemerná teplota je 18.7 °C a turistické hodnotenie je 4.3 /5.
> cat("Má vodné plochy:", has_water, "— obývaná:", is_inhabited, "\n\n")
Má vodné plochy: TRUE — obývaná: TRUE 

> 
> # 1.2 Vectors -------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> # Numeric vector combining numeric and integer variables
> numeric_vector <- c(avg_temperature, surface_area_million_km2,
+                     avg_elevation_m, tourism_rating,
+                     as.numeric(num_moons), as.numeric(num_cities),
+                     as.numeric(population_thousands))
> print("Numeric vector combining numeric + integer variables:")
[1] "Numeric vector combining numeric + integer variables:"
> print(numeric_vector)
[1]   18.70    1.45  820.30    4.30    2.00    7.00 2435.00
> 
> # Sequence vector: choose start between 10-50 -> from = 23, step between 2-10 -> by = 7
> sequence_vector <- seq(from = 23, to = 100, by = 7)
> print("Sequence vector (23 to 100 by 7):")
[1] "Sequence vector (23 to 100 by 7):"
> print(sequence_vector)
 [1]  23  30  37  44  51  58  65  72  79  86  93 100
> 
> # Logical vector length 10 with random TRUE/FALSE
> set.seed(123) # pre reproducibility
> logical_vector <- sample(c(TRUE, FALSE), size = 10, replace = TRUE)
> print("Random logical vector (length 10):")
[1] "Random logical vector (length 10):"
> print(logical_vector)
 [1]  TRUE  TRUE  TRUE FALSE  TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE  TRUE  TRUE
> cat("\n")

> 
> # 1.3 Matrix --------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> # 3x3 matrix with random integers between -50 and 50
> set.seed(42)
> mat_vals <- sample(-50:50, size = 9, replace = TRUE)
> aurelia_matrix <- matrix(mat_vals, nrow = 3, ncol = 3, byrow = TRUE)
> rownames(aurelia_matrix) <- c("North_Isles", "Central_Sea", "South_Plateau")
> colnames(aurelia_matrix) <- c("Sector_A", "Sector_B", "Sector_C")
> print("Aurelia 3x3 matrix:")
[1] "Aurelia 3x3 matrix:"
> print(aurelia_matrix)
              Sector_A Sector_B Sector_C
North_Isles         -2       50       14
Central_Sea        -26       23       49
South_Plateau      -33       -2       -4
> 
> # Row and column averages
> row_avgs <- rowMeans(aurelia_matrix)
> col_avgs <- colMeans(aurelia_matrix)
> cat("Row means:\n"); print(row_avgs)
Row means:
  North_Isles   Central_Sea South_Plateau 
     20.66667      15.33333     -13.00000 
> cat("Column means:\n"); print(col_avgs)
Column means:
 Sector_A  Sector_B  Sector_C 
-20.33333  23.66667  19.66667 
> cat("\n")

> # 1.4 List ----------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> aurelia_list <- list(
+     # atomic variables
+     avg_temperature = avg_temperature,
+     surface_area_million_km2 = surface_area_million_km2,
+     avg_elevation_m = avg_elevation_m,
+     tourism_rating = tourism_rating,
+     num_moons = num_moons,
+     num_cities = num_cities,
+     population_thousands = population_thousands,
+     has_water = has_water,
+     is_inhabited = is_inhabited,
+     planet_name = planet_name,
+     region = region,
+     category = category,
+     # vectors + matrix
+     numeric_vector = numeric_vector,
+     sequence_vector = sequence_vector,
+     logical_vector = logical_vector,
+     aurelia_matrix = aurelia_matrix,
+     # description
+     description = "Aurelia je mierne teplá ostrovná planéta s rozmanitým povrchom, obývaná inteligentnými druhmi a s rozvíjajúcim sa cestovným ruchom."
+ )

> # 1.5 Factor --------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> # Vytvoríme faktor s kategóriami zdrojov: "low","medium","high"
> resource_levels <- factor(c("high", "medium", "low", "medium", "high", "low"),

> # 1.6 Data Frame ----------------------------------------------------------
> 
> # Vytvoríme data frame s 6 observáciami (mesta/regionu na Aurelii)
> names_vec <- c("Marisport", "Fernhill", "Glaeron", "Covehaven", "Highcrest", "Lowmarsh")
> population_k <- c(420, 310, 150, 225, 560, 170)  # v tisícoch
> resource_score <- c(820, 610, 290, 450, 1120, 310) # abstraktné číslo zdrojov

> habitable_flag <- c(TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, FALSE)
> category_vec <- factor(c("coastal", "hinterland", "plateau", "coastal", "plateau", "wetland"))
> 
> aurelia_df <- data.frame(
+     name = names_vec,
+     population_k = population_k,
+     resource_score = resource_score,
+     avg_temp = avg_temp_region,
+     habitable = habitable_flag,
+     category = category_vec,
+     stringsAsFactors = FALSE
+ )
> 
> # Premenovanie stlpcov
> colnames(aurelia_df) <- c("Name", "Population_k", "ResourceScore", "AvgTemp_C", "Habitable", "Category")
